author: pauls
msg: URLHandlers are broken on harmony and J9. The reason is that they don't expect somebody to call toExternalForm from inside a URLHandlers. That causes a NPE and subsequently, we don't start-up. This fixes the issue for harmony and hopefully for J9 as well.  (FELIX-893)

author: fmeschbe
msg: SLING-1008 Support configuring mappings without explicit port numbers for
well known port numbers (80 for http and 443 for https)
